channel.title: Help! i need this so bad!
channel.description:
I keep on getting this one thing happen to me, it's only one player and it sais loads of weird things, such as "Browsing your internet"
[IMG]http://i546.photobucket.com/albums/hh417/Runescapecomunity/wtf.jpg[/img]
What can I do about it?
IP ban only works for a while...

item.title: Help! i need this so bad!
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

I have declared it all in client.java but it comes back :S
I just don’t get it…
Is it going to do anything bad or will it just annoy us?

Read full topic

item.title: Help! i need this so bad!
item.dc:creator: @spon80 spon80
item.description:
@spon80 wrote:

                                                    [font=Verdana]WORKS 100%[/font]

declare in client.

[code]public void appendToIPBanned (String player) {

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true)); //w/e your ip banned is
 bw.write(player);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error banning ip");
 }
  }

}[/code]
and this under that.

[code]public void appendToBanned (String player) {

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedusers.txt", true));
 bw.write(player);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error banning user!");
 }
  }

}[/code]
then declare under process

[code]if(connectedFrom.contains(".sccoast.net") || playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains(“silab”) || playerName.contains(“suck”) || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">")
|| playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains(“invalid”) || playerName.contains("–") || playerName.contains("- - “) || playerName.contains(”- “) || playerName.contains(”- -") || playerName.contains("") || playerName.contains(“null”) || playerName.contains("***") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("") || playerName.contains(“") || playerName.contains("") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains(" “) || playerName.contains(” “) || playerName.contains(” “) || playerName.contains(“SYI”) || playerName.contains(””) || playerName.contains("***") || playerName.contains("") || playerName.contains("") || playerName.contains(“nazi”) || playerName.contains("`") || playerName.contains("’") && (playerRights <= 2))
{
sendMessage(“Invalid name.”);
appendToBanned(playerName);
appendToIPBanned(connectedFrom);
savefile = true;

       PlayerHandler.kickNick = playerName;
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Server: is banning "
                + playerName;
        appendToBanned(playerName);
        BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + playerName);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
                }
            }
        }

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedusers.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + playerName);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
                }
            }
        }

disconnected = true;
}
[/code]

On my server .sccoast.net is his host. if its different on your server change
